Text: I only can upload up to 5Mbps..So please seed this great game!

At last a full version off the game no more
shareware for me.Love it.
Thanks uploader.
I am seeding it for now, but I am unable to get the game to work. Can you explain the installation process? Thanks!
I have figured it out, I needed to download a program like CloneCD that can burn .ISO files to a CD. I'll keep seeding!
Well I tried, but the game only gives me an error message.

I burned it to a disc and everything, but when it comes to installing it. I pick my sound card and "high speed PC", and press enter, and it just closes.
If I try and open it without installing, Vista just says that it doesn't support full-screen games, and the message keeps appearing over and over, and the game does nothing :(
Glad to see people still like it.
